TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlImage extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 提供对服务器上 HTML 元素的编程访问。

span.span: Provides programmatic access for the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控件可在网页上显示图像。Use this control to display an image on a Web page. 控件可以以编程方式操作，以更改显示的图像，图像大小和相对于其他页面元素的图像对齐方式。The control can be programmatically manipulated to change the image displayed, the image size, and the alignment of the image relative to other page elements. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式修改的属性控制单击。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the properties of an control when an is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"Img"文字字符串。The "img" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建和初始化的新实例控件。The following code example illustrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/CS/htmlimagectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/VB/htmlimagectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图像相对于其他网页元素的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

value.span: 字符串，它指定图像相对于其他网页元素的对齐方式。

span.span: A string that specifies the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此属性用于在网页上指定的图像相对于其他元素的对齐方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the image with respect to other elements on the Web page. 下表提供了可能的值。The following table represents the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |左left|图像的网页的左侧对齐。The image is aligned on the left side of the Web page.| |centercenter|图像的在网页上的中心对齐。The image is aligned in the center of the Web page.| |右right|图像的 Web 页面右侧对齐。The image is aligned on the right side of the Web page.| |toptop|在网页上其他元素的图像的上边缘对齐。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the top edge of the image.| |中间middle|与图像的中间对齐网页中的其他元素。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the middle of the image.| |bottombottom|在网页上其他元素的映像的下边缘对齐。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the bottom edge of the image.| > [!NOTE] > 中间值可能不适用于所有浏览器。The center value might not work on all browsers. 若要将图像置于中心，将包装段落标记，包含控件`align`属性设置为`"center"`(`

`)。To center an image, wrap the control inside paragraph tags that contain the `align` attribute set to `"center"` (`

`). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性在网页上指定的图像对齐方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of an image on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何在网页上将图像置于中心通过包装具有段落标记内的控件`align`属性设置为`"center"`。The following code example demonstrates how to center an image on the Web page by wrapping the control inside paragraph tags with the `align` attribute set to `"center"`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Alt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置在图像不可用或当前正在下载且尚未完成的情况下浏览器显示的替换标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative caption the browser displays if an image is unavailable or currently downloading and not yet finished.

value.span: 字符串，它包含图像不可用时浏览器所使用的替换标题。

span.span: A string that contains the alternative caption for the browser to use when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定当指定的图像时显示的标题属性是不可用。Use this property to specify the caption displayed when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 在较新的浏览器，此标题也显示为工具提示。On newer browsers, this caption also appears as a ToolTip. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在指定的图像时显示的标题属性是不可用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display when the image specified by the property is unavailable. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图像框的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a frame for an image.

value.span: 图像框的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of a frame for an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性与指定的宽度 （以像素为单位） 的映像创建一个框架。Use this property to create a frame with the specified width (in pixels) for an image. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以指定宽度为 5 个像素的帧控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a frame with a width of 5 pixels for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性都可以使用两种方法。The and properties can be used two ways. 你可以使用和属性发送到浏览器的图像的大小规范。You can use the and properties to send image size specifications to the browser. 因为浏览器不需要重新计算页面上的元素的位置加载图像时，这更快地显示网页。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 你还可以使用和属性，以将图像缩放。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 当使用的物理大小的图像的不同值，该映像是相应地调整大小。When using values different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 但是，不建议此方法用于缩放该图像，因为它采用更长时间的页后，可以显示它。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反，以物理方式调整图像的大小所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 默认情况下，属性表示以像素为单位，但是它也可以表示为窗口的大小的百分比。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the size of the window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式修改显示的图像的高度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the height of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: 包含要在客户端上呈现的输出流的 。

span.span: The that contains the output stream to render on the client.

summary.span: 将 控件的属性呈现到指定的 对象。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值属性是一个格式不正确的 URL，方法抛出异常异常。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, the method throws an exception. 方法重写基类的方法写入`src`属性呈现的控件。The method overrides the base class's method to write the `src` attribute of the rendered control. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法中的自定义的服务器控件，以便为工具提示，可访问的特定备用文本始终显示为带有控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternative text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 属性包含格式不正确的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要显示的图像文件的源。

span.span: Gets or sets the source of the image file to display.

value.span: 字符串，它包含要显示的图像文件的路径。

span.span: A string that contains the path to an image file to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要显示的图像文件的路径。Use this property to specify the path to the image file to display. 如果在使用它的网页源代码文件所在的目录中有图像文件，你可以只需指定的文件名称。If the image file is in the same directory as the Web page source file that uses it, you can just specify the file name. 否则，您还必须包含文件的路径。Otherwise, you must also include the path to the file. 路径可以是绝对或相对于包含网页源文件的目录。The path can be absolute or relative to the directory that contains the Web page source file. 你可以使用相对路径" `~/` "来指代当前页所处的虚拟目录。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如，值为为``页上的"XspTest"虚拟目录是``。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在网页源文件所在的同一目录中显示的图像文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in the same directory as the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定要在网页源文件中的不同目录中显示的图像文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in a different directory from the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和属性都可以使用两种方法。The and properties can be used two ways. 你可以使用和将大小规范的映像发送到浏览器的属性。You can use the and properties to send the image size specifications to the browser. 因为浏览器不需要重新计算页面上的元素的位置加载图像时，这更快地显示网页。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 你还可以使用和属性，以将图像缩放。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 当使用的值不同的映像的物理大小，该映像是相应地调整大小。When using values that are different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 但是，不建议此方法用于缩放该图像，因为它采用更长时间的页后，可以显示它。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反，以物理方式调整图像的大小所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 默认情况下，属性表示以像素为单位，但是它也可以表示为窗口大小的百分比。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the window size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式修改显示的图像的宽度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the width of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
